title: Pixel 3A XL & Pixel 3A not holding wifi connection
content:
Android 11 Dec. 5, 2020 
I have one of my home wifi networks (ATT8XzZ7RG_guest) that will not hold connection on this Pixel or my wife's Pixel 3A. This same network works just fine on other google home devices and iOS mobile devices. 

I have done the FORGET network thing several times over several days. Reset network. Bluetooth off/on. Data off off/on. Airplane mode off/on.

I am very close to wifi router. internet speeds >100mbps.  

see my youtube of issue HERE

Any clues? 

#TANKS
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
